channel.title: Slayer
channel.description: Okay, I added Vannaka. But where do I set the slayer exp rates? Or can I just remove the whole slaying, so that you can kill abyssal demons etc. without a slayer requirement?

item.title: Slayer

item.description:
@Conspiracy wrote:

Okay, I added Vannaka. But where do I set the slayer exp rates? Or can I just remove the whole slaying, so that you can kill abyssal demons etc. without a slayer requirement?
